# WEAPON::SET_PED_SHOOT_ORDNANCE_WEAPON

## Summary
Fires off ordnance weapon and returns the projectile object to script for control

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **FLOAT** projectileLifeTime = -1:
Will determine how long (in secs) the projectile will live.
By default the life time is infinite.
Projectile will still be destroyed on contact with any physical body.

## Returns
* **ENTITY_INDEX**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns handle of the projectile.
